title: An extreme sport fuelled by bamboo
text:
Sports An extreme sport fuelled by bamboo Started just a few years ago in the Philippines, this adrenaline-fuelled adventure is – thanks to the internet – attracting fans from around the world. By BBC's The Travel Show 24 July 2015 
Started just a few years ago in the Philippines, this adrenaline-fuelled adventure is – thanks to the internet – attracting fans from around the world.
